00026 #ifndef SWIRIL_LOG_H
00027 #define SWIRIL_LOG_H 
00028 
00029 #include "telephony/ril.h"
00030 
00031 /* Comment/uncomment following line to disbale/enable RIL debug print */
00032 #define SIERRA_RILDEBUG 1
00033 #ifndef SIERRA_RILDEBUG
00034 /* Undefine debug logging except LOGE */
00035 #define LOGI(...)   ((void)0)
00036 #define LOGD(...)   ((void)0)
00037 #define LOGW(...)   ((void)0)
00038 #endif /* SIERRA_RILDEBUG */
00039 
00040 #if (RIL_VERSION == 7)
00041 #define LOGV(...) ALOGV(__VA_ARGS__)
00042 #define LOGI(...) ALOGI(__VA_ARGS__)
00043 #define LOGD(...) ALOGD(__VA_ARGS__)
00044 #define LOGE(...) ALOGE(__VA_ARGS__)
00045 #define LOGW(...) ALOGW(__VA_ARGS__)
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #include <cutils/log.h>
00049 
00050 #endif /* SWIRIL_LOG_H */
